name: POLICE
description: Police memecoin is all about that unbreakable community spirit, gut-busting hilarity, and turning the crypto wild west into a spotless utopia (cleaner than your grandma's NFT collection, no cap). POLICE – the blockchain’s sassiest crypto cops, here to meme the heck out of scammers, ruggers, and pump-and-dump chumps! We’re all about community, hilarity, and keeping the blockchain cleaner than a freshly minted NFT. Join the squad, hodl some $POLICE, and help us chase down those pump-and-dump clowns.
